revision.text: Possibly: Thoughts on the Prospect of a Regicide Peace, in a series of letters. (By Edmund Burke). (London : Printed for J. Owen, No. 168, Piccadilly, 1796). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2432859~S1 or Two letters addressed to a Member of the Present Parliament, on the proposals for Peace with the Regicide Directory of France. By the Right Hon. Edmund Burke. (London : Printed for F. and C. Rivington, St. Paul's Church-yard, 1796). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2432837~S1
